title: [BUG] Missing upstream repo: https://skia.googlesource.com/common.git
body:
**Description**

Trying to build 2.88.3, the git-sync-deps runs into an error, it seems an upstream repo no longer exists: https://skia.googlesource.com/common.git. I'm not sure whether it's important or not since the build succeeds, but we have issues using the managed skia component with the resulting library.

**Code**

N/A

**Expected Behavior**

The DEPS file should list an existing repository.

**Actual Behavior**

The DEPS file contains a phantom repository.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.3
- Last known good version:  2.80.2

**Screenshots**

N/A

**Reproduction Link**

N/A
